p: In a study conducted by Chan et al., three novel RT-PCR assays targeting the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp)/helicase (Hel), spike (S), and nucleocapsid (N) genes of SARS-CoV-2 were developed. Then, these assays were compared to each other and to that of the reported RdRp-P2 assay, which is used in many laboratories in Europe.
